name: Heavy 4x4 Truck Trailer - Transport Cargo 2017 3D
description:
Get ready for an exciting OFF-ROAD driving simulation experience. You have heavy cargo, vehicles and other Equipment from one place to another. Drive to explore off-road hilly and mountains environment and test your driving skills.

This Heavy Truck Trailer 4x4 Cargo game will surely test you pro driving skills when you have to drive an 18 wheeler trailer with heavy cargo. Cargo transportation is itself a challenging task but its challenge multiplies when it is in mountainous and hilly environment. Off road driving tricks are much different from road driving. You have to face multiple dangerous turns and steep climb movement.

Become a truck driver in this exciting new truck simulation game. Get in your truck and deliver cargo to your ending point. Carry all the materials and other things very carefully to your destination. First you have load the 4x4 army jeeps, tanks, cars and other heavy vehicles from one place to another place safe and sound.

You the drive the heavy trucks and trailers and carry the vehicles to the destination. Times is key is here. As much as time you will consume the point will be less and in less time the points will be higher and higher. And be careful with physical moment of the driving don’t let anything fall. If vehicles falls the mission will be fail.
Feature:
• Hilly and mountains Environment.
• 3D and Optimized Graphics.
• HD Sound Quality.
• Friendly Mode Game.
• New Models of Trucks and Trailers
• New models of 4x4 Jeeps and vehicles.
• Realistic physics.
Enjoy the Game and waiting for your Feedback.
Good Luck!
